summary: Ladies and gentlemen, Today I introduce to you: A golden retriever texture for your dog
descriptionHtml:
If you're using one of my mods for the first time you should note-------------------------------------------------
1. I translate and import files from Chinese gaming forums
2. Chinese copyright laws do not affect any other country, and vice versa
3. I still do my best to try and credit the authors of the mods I upload

Introduction--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Because: Dogs need a update

Description---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Unzip
- Drag and drop into Data
- Start the game
Or just use NMM

If you encounter a problem-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please try and solve it among yourselves if possible, for I am only the up loader of this mod

-berniem4483
author: berniem4483
